AllocateAnycastEipAddress.title: AllocateAnycastEipAddress
AllocateAnycastEipAddress.summary: Creates an Anycast elastic IP address (EIP).

AssociateAnycastEipAddress.title: AssociateAnycastEipAddress
AssociateAnycastEipAddress.summary: Associates an Anycast EIP with an endpoint.

DescribeAnycastEipAddress.title: DescribeAnycastEipAddress
DescribeAnycastEipAddress.summary: Queries Anycast elastic IP addresses (Anycast EIPs) associated with specified instance IP addresses or instance IDs, including instance status, maximum bandwidth, and associated resources.

DescribeAnycastPopLocations.title: DescribeAnycastPopLocations
DescribeAnycastPopLocations.summary: Queries the access points in an access area.

DescribeAnycastServerRegions.title: DescribeAnycastServerRegions
DescribeAnycastServerRegions.summary: Queries regions where you can associate Anycast elastic IP addresses (Anycast EIPs) with endpoints.

ListAnycastEipAddresses.title: ListAnycastEipAddresses
ListAnycastEipAddresses.summary: Queries information about Anycast elastic IP addresses (Anycast EIPs) in a region, including instance status, maximum bandwidth, and associated resources.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries Anycast elastic IP addresses (Anycast EIPs).

ModifyAnycastEipAddressAttribute.title: ModifyAnycastEipAddressAttribute
ModifyAnycastEipAddressAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of an Anycast elastic IP address (Anycast EIP).

ModifyAnycastEipAddressSpec.title: ModifyAnycastEipAddressSpec
ModifyAnycastEipAddressSpec.summary: Modifies the maximum bandwidth of an Anycast elastic IP address (Anycast EIP).

ReleaseAnycastEipAddress.title: ReleaseAnycastEipAddress
ReleaseAnycastEipAddress.summary: Releases an Anycast elastic IP address (Anycast EIP).

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and adds them to resources.

UnassociateAnycastEipAddress.title: UnassociateAnycastEipAddress
UnassociateAnycastEipAddress.summary: Disassociates an Anycast EIP from an endpoint.

UpdateAnycastEipAddressAssociations.title: UpdateAnycastEipAddressAssociations
UpdateAnycastEipAddressAssociations.summary: If an Anycast EIP is associated with endpoints in different regions, you can change the access points that are mapped to an endpoint. You can call UpdateAnycastEipAddressAssociations to add or delete endpoints to modify the mappings between endpoints and access points.
